name: ColorInc.
description:
This is a game for the 48secretjam with the themes: Selling and Color.

Your goal is to sell as much boxes filled with cans of paint to keep your balance positive.

Wrong cans in wrong boxes mean that you have to pay the fines that the companies charge you for that.

Made by:

Tada(BackflipGames) and Daniel Galletti(https://dangalletti.itch.io/).

Enjoy!
